author: Iñigo Sáenz de Ugarte
title: Junta de Extremadura lamenta el fallecimiento de político francés Jacques Delors, primer Premio Europeo Carlos V
text:
La Junta de Extremadura, junto al Patronato y el equipo de la Fundación Academia Europea e Iberoamericana de Yuste, ha lamentado el fallecimiento del político francés Jacques Delors, expresidente de la Comisión Europea y primera persona en recibir el Premio Europeo Carlos V. Delors fue galardonado el 6 de junio de 1995 “por su espíritu abierto, tolerante y partidario de un modelo europeo de sociedad basado en la defensa de los valores de la democracia y los derechos humanos”, según informa la Junta en un comunicado de prensa.
Durante el discurso de recogida de este reconocimiento, Delors destacó la creación del Premio Europeo Carlos V y de la Academia Europea de Yuste, que “se consagraría a impulsar la reflexión, la investigación y la creación cultural y artística”.
Además, se refirió a la figura de Carlos V como alguien que “marcó con su sello personal una Europa ampliamente unida, una historia de nuestro continente que llevaba la impronta de otro artífice de Europa, Carlomagno”.
Finalizó su intervención preguntándose si se sería capaz de dar vida a lo que significaba ser europeos y lo bastante humildes para dialogar con el mundo y de este modo mantener la vocación universal de Europa.
Jacques Delors presidió la Comisión Europea entre 1985 y 1995, de ahí que se convirtiera en uno de los artífices del proceso de construcción de la Unión coincidiendo su mandato con la entrada de España en la CEE en 1986.
En ese tiempo protagonizó algunos de los avances más destacados como la creación del mercado único europeo, la firma de los acuerdos de Schengen, el Acta Única Europea, el lanzamiento del programa de intercambio de estudiantes Erasmus, del que se han beneficiado millones de jóvenes europeos y miles de españoles, la reforma de la Política Agraria Común y la puesta en marcha de la Unión Económica y Monetaria, por lo que es conocido como el 'padre del euro'.
La relación del premiado con la Fundación Academia Europea e Iberoamericana fue muy prolija. Entre otras actividades, participó como miembro del jurado en todos los Premios Europeos Carlos V y era miembro del Patronato de la Fundación.

author: Toofab Staff
title: Angelina Pivarnick & Vinny Tortorella Split, Accuse Each Other of Cheating
text:
After Angelina accuses him of cheating on the Jersey Shore reunion, Vinny goes off on Instagram -- threatening to release proof she stepped out on him, adding, "I'm embarrassed of what my life became because of this relationship."
It's splittsville for Jersey Shore Family Vacation star Angelina Pivarnick and Vinny "2.0" Tortorella.
During last week's reunion special for the most recent season of the MTV series, Angelina all but said the two had separated -- as she accused him of infidelity.
"So, we're currently filming for another season. I found out he cheated on me so," she shared when asked about their status, before Jenni "JWoww" Farley added, "Let's just say the next season is going to be interesting."
Waiting for your permission to load the Instagram Media.
As Mike "The Situation" Sorrentino said Vinny was "not in it for the right reasons," Angelina added that he "never was." She then said, "He's a clout chaser and he just wanted to be on TV and he didn't care about anything that had to do with me, just about TV. He was trying to be on The Bachelorette before me."
Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi also claimed he "supposedly" tried out to be on the original Jersey Shore back in the day -- while Angelina brought up his appearance on a wrestling show, as well as his alleged Bachelorette aspirations.
Vinny, however, offered his own insight into their relationship on Instagram -- confirming the split by claiming he "broke the relationship off" while responding to a follower who wrote, "Angelina exposed you huh."
Waiting for your permission to load the Instagram Media.
"I'm embarrassed of what my life became because of this relationship," he continued, hitting back at suggestions he was leeching off her. "You really think she'd date, let alone get engaged to a bum? We were together for 9 months before we got engaged. Spoke about it and knew that we would do it."
"When she found out my best friend and sister were getting engaged she got jealous, furious and told me I needed to do it before them. Don't believe me, I have all the text convos," he continued. "I funded and paid for a millionaire's life, for as long as I was together. Paid my housing expenses for the place I had since in Staten Island since 2015, which she never allowed me to go to, plus all of her monthly housing expenses. Even back paid past due bills that her ex left her with from before I even knew her. I always paid my part and provided."
Getty
Jersey Shore's Angelina Pivarnick Pleads Guilty to Disorderly Conduct in Domestic Violence Case
View StoryHe said the Jersey reunion was filmed back in May -- and he "found out for the first time I was cheated on 3 months prior."
"Forgave her and tried to work things out. I didn't watch the reunion but saw the clip they posted. She made sure to plant the seed trying to say I cheated, WELL show some proof then. It doesn't exist!" he continued, before threatening to release "the 30 min video I recorded of her phone showing all the convos/videos/photos with other men?"
Vinny claimed the "cheating continued," before he then addressed having a Hinge account.
"Oh and I made a hinge 2 weeks after finding out I was still being cheated on this past November. I broke the relationship off and wanted to find a new woman," he wrote. "I deserve that chance after getting screwed over multiple times."
MTV
Sammi and Angelina Face Off, As The Situation Nearly Comes to Blows with Vinny 2.0 on Jersey Shore
View StoryAs for the "clout chasing" claims by Angelina and her cast mates, he said he told his ex about his reality TV past.
"During the early 2000s every club/mall you went to around the tri state area, had producers/recruiters for tv shows," he said, before addressing his wrestling past. "If I would have gotten on the bachelorette maybe I'd be praised like other significant others that legit met their significant other on a dating show. Why am I treated different?? You trolls make absolutely no sense."
He ended his rant by adding, "lmao here's a spoiler too."
TikTok/MTV

author: 网易
title: 信审专家能力数字化，金融机构"AI秘书"成现实|算法|琶洲|大模型|人工智能|ai秘书|金融行业_网易订阅
text:
杨静俐 上海安硕信息技术股份有限公司算法专家 千寻大模型研发团队核心成员
采写丨南都·琶洲π记者何茵桃
图片丨受访者提供　　
人物名片：
杨静俐
上海安硕信息技术股份有限公司算法专家
千寻大模型研发团队核心成员　　
上海安硕信息技术股份有限公司（后简称为“安硕信息”）成立于2001年，是一家以金融机构资产管理为核心，集软件服务、咨询服务、数字化为一体的全面资产管理解决方案提供商。
其研发的千寻大模型，能够满足用户企业征信、行业产业、财务分析、尽调报告等多层次问答诉求，深度赋能金融机构尽职调查全流程、多场景，实现信审专家能力数字化、工具化、便捷化。
杨静俐是千寻大模型研发团队核心成员之一。在第三届琶洲算法大赛上，杨静俐担任了出题者的角色，推出了GLM法律行业大模型挑战赛，旨在探索大语言模型在法律行业的应用潜力。
针对资产管理场景
打造金融领域级应用大模型
杨静俐于2015年毕业于上海理工大学数学与应用数学专业。2017年起，她选择从事人工智能相关工作，前期主要研究自然语言处理，后期主要研究大模型相关技术。今年，杨静俐在第三届琶洲算法大赛上被评选为“琶洲领军算法师”。对此，杨静俐感到十分意外。“这个荣誉不是对我一个人的认可，也是对赛题、对赛题团队成员付出的认可。”
“成为算法工程师是时代推进的结果。”
2021年1月，杨静俐加入安硕信息。她介绍道，安硕信息运用了非常齐全的数据，几乎包括工商信息、所有上市公司的金融信息，裁判文书资料等所有公开数据。“我非常擅长数据这一块，于是选择加入安硕信息。”
2024年8月，安硕信息研发的千寻大模型作为千寻大语言模型算法的应用载体，成为国内企业信用信息服务领域首个通过算法备案的大模型产品。
千寻大模型是安硕信息基于自有海量金融领域语料库，结合金融机构全客户、全流程、全运营、全渠道等业务场景端业务经验，联合多所高校及研究院，针对资产管理场景打造的金融领域级应用大模型。
最初研发千寻大模型时，杨静俐和团队成员都是摸着石头过河，团队成员开了不下十次会议讨论需要做什么、能做到什么程度、会产生哪些影响等问题。
目前，千寻大模型能够提供智能简答、智能短评、智能应用、智能分析等多样化服务形态，帮助金融机构实现大模型的高效部署、创新应用，将“AI秘书”变成现实。杨静俐介绍，千寻大模型的专业度已经得到了多家银行的认可，服务了不少银行客户以及券商客户。
在人工智能行业深耕多年，杨静俐享受算法工作她称自己属于快乐工作的类型。“不管加班到多晚，只要是为了让工作完成得更好，我都会很兴奋快乐。”杨静俐认为，这是实现自己目标的一步一步阶梯，每一步都是成长。“我很珍惜每一次成长的机会，也很享受每一次因成长所需带来的工作。”
“我选择从事AIGC，一是因为缘分，二是因为喜欢，三是本身就擅长，这一切都是水到渠成、顺其自然的结果。”这也让杨静俐在长达十年的算法工作生涯中，如勇士般战无不胜。杨静俐称，目前所有项目的根源都是数据，她尤其擅长把复杂问题简单化，在短时间内找准问题的解决方案。“唯独比较难解决的问题是分身乏力，能同时做的事情数量有限。
为琶洲算法大赛出题
探索大语言模型在法律行业的应用
2024年，安硕信息联合多家企业机构发起了GLM法律行业大模型挑战赛，该挑战赛隶属于第三届琶洲算法大赛AI大模型挑战赛赛道。参赛者需基于GLM-4模型，制定一个可行的技术方案。该方案应利用大语言模型的语义理解和函数调用等功能，准确解析用户的自然语言查询，并通过访问相关法律数据库或API，提供多项指定服务。
在设计赛题的时候，杨静俐及团队成员首要考虑的，是赛题是否存在技术难点或处于技术瓶颈。其次便是考虑赛题的影响力及其意义，即赛题做出来后会对哪方面产生影响。“比如金融类的赛题，我们考察的是Text-to-SOL，不仅要适用于金融场景还要泛化到各行各业。最后还会考虑赛题是否有趣、选手是否喜欢。”
“比赛全程，我们都会陪伴选手，解答他们的疑惑。”杨静俐称:“如果选手刚开始没有灵感，我们会提供建议及研究方向。”从赛事结果来看，杨静俐觉得整体的答题质量十分令人惊喜，她看到了不少前沿的“答卷”。
“设计赛题并不只是完成任务，而是让更多人了解大模型能做什么、能对社会带来哪些影响。”杨静俐称。从设计赛题到比赛开始，杨静俐及团队花费了大概两个月的时间。“有时候出题到凌晨两三点，通宵更是不在话下。”
第三次科技革命带来了电子计算机的迅速发展和广泛运用，开辟了信息时代。杨静俐认为大模型会带来一场类工业革命。她表示:“我相信大模型日后会走进各行各业，在金融、司法、教育、政务数据等领域做出亮眼的成果。”
杨静俐十分看好琶洲发展人工智能产业。由政府牵头发起的琶洲算法大赛，便足以看出琶洲发展人工智能大模型应用示范区的决心。“我认为每一个赛题都是一个科研的小项目，相当于一个尝试的机会。勇于尝试就会带来各种各样的惊喜，从而推进各行各业的科研攻关。”
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science
Economy, Business and Finance->computing and information technology
